seo.title: Tampermonkey YouTube download tutorial (Bilibili) | Free userscript guide
seo.description: Step-by-step Tampermonkey userscript workflow to save YouTube videos. Includes my Bilibili tutorial video, setup steps, and safety notes.
seo.keywords: tampermonkey youtube download, youtube download script, grease monkey, bilibili tutorial, userscript downloader, download youtube video tampermonkey

hero.title: Download YouTube videos with a Tampermonkey userscript
hero.summary: Follow my Bilibili walkthrough to install Tampermonkey and add a YouTube download script. Works alongside freesavevideo.online when direct downloads are blocked.

video.title: Watch the full Tampermonkey setup
video.description: The video shows where to grab the userscript, how to enable it, and how to trigger downloads on a YouTube watch page.

points.reliable: A fallback when platforms block direct downloads.
points.safe: Keep scripts in your own browser; no account needed.
points.multi: Works on Chrome, Edge, Firefox and other Chromium-based browsers.
points.combo: Pair the script with freesavevideo.online to cover more sites.

install.title: Install Tampermonkey
install.desc: Add the Tampermonkey extension from the Chrome Web Store or your browser's add-on store, then pin it for quick access.

script.title: Add the YouTube download script
script.desc: Open the script link from the Bilibili video description or pinned comment, review the code, and click “Install” in Tampermonkey.

download.title: Open a YouTube video and pick a quality
download.desc: Refresh the YouTube watch page; the script shows a download button. Choose MP4 quality, then let the script fetch the media.

legal.title: Stay compliant
legal.desc: Download only content you have rights to. Respect YouTube’s Terms of Service and local copyright rules.

quality.q: Which qualities does the script support?
quality.a: Most scripts provide 720p or 1080p. Very high resolutions or age-restricted videos may require DASH merging, which some scripts skip.

broken.q: What if the script stops working?
broken.a: YouTube updates often. Check the Bilibili description for updates, reinstall the latest script, or switch to freesavevideo.online for other platforms.

safe.a: The script runs locally in your browser. Still, only download videos you own or have permission to save, and avoid commercial redistribution.

cta.title: Need a backup downloader?
cta.subtitle: Use freesavevideo.online for TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, and more while keeping the Tampermonkey script for YouTube.

guide.page_desc: Two-step setup, three-step download, plus fixes for stalls and save prompts.

video_points.1: Script install and buttons for MP4/MP3.
video_points.2: What to do when progress stalls around 2%.
video_points.3: How to allow pop-ups so the save dialog appears.

fallback.title: Embed blocked or unstable on mobile
fallback.desc: Open the tutorial in a new tab.

prep.title: Core setup (2 steps)
prep.subtitle: Install the extension, then the script. After that, download buttons appear on YouTube pages.

steps.1: Install the extension: search and install "Tampermonkey" from your browser extension store.
steps.2: Install the script: find the "YouTube tools" script, click "Install this script," and confirm adding it to Tampermonkey.

flow.title: Download flow
flow.subtitle: Click the buttons to finish the download.

steps.1: Open any YouTube video; new buttons from the script appear under the video.
steps.2: Click the MP4 button and pick a resolution (e.g., 720p) from the dropdown.
steps.3: Click download to start. Progress may pause around 2%—wait and it continues.
steps.4: When finished, if pop-ups are blocked, click "Allow" in the address bar, then choose a save location.

items.1: A brief stall at ~2% is normal—wait and it resumes.
items.2: If no save dialog appears, allow pop-ups and try again.

faq2.title: Troubleshooting

no_buttons.title: No download buttons under the YouTube video

steps.1: Chrome > Extensions > Manage extensions > find Tampermonkey > Details.
steps.2: Enable “Allow this site to run scripts” (or user scripts).
steps.3: Restart the browser and reopen the YouTube page.

no_save.title: No save dialog after download finishes

steps.1: When done, the address bar may show “Enable pop-ups on YouTube to automatically download the video.” Click Allow.
steps.2: If missed, open Site settings > Pop-ups and redirects, and allow youtube.com.

faq2.screenshot_note: In the address bar, allow “Pop-ups and redirects.”
faq2.screenshot_alt: Chrome example enabling pop-ups and redirects for YouTube
